titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Forasmuch as vpon the lame[n]table complaint made vnto the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, by sundry her louing subiects the clothiers of diuers partes of the realme [and] of a multitude of other people mayntayned in their handlabours by them, ...
Proclamations. 1579-04-30

publicationStmt.publisher: At Bacon house by Christopher Barker, Printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Forbidding engrossing of wool; temporarily staying its export--STC.
